Preferences.keyName: Rename selected layer, composition, folder, effect, group, or mask
Preferences.keyTrans: 重命名所选图层、合成、文件夹、效果、组或蒙版

Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyName: Open selected layer, composition, or footage item
Panels, viewers, workspaces.keyTrans: 打开所选图层、合成或素材项目

Activate.keyName: Move selected layers, masks, effects, or render items down (back) or up (forward) in stacking order
Activate.keyTrans: 按堆叠顺序向下（向后）或向上（向前）移动所选图层、蒙版、效果或渲染项目
Activate.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Up Arrow

Composition.keyName: Move selected layers, masks, effects, or render items to bottom (back) or top (front) of stacking order
Composition.keyTrans: 将选定的图层、蒙版、效果或渲染项目移动到堆叠顺序的底部（背面）或顶部（正面）
Composition.keyValue: Ctrl Alt Shift Down Arrow or Ctrl Alt Shift Up Arrow

Time navigation.keyName: Extend selection to next item in Project panel, Render Queue panel, or Effect Controls panel
Time navigation.keyTrans: 将所选内容扩展到“项目”面板、“渲染队列”面板或“效果控件”面板中的下一项

Previews.keyName: Extend selection to previous item in Project panel, Render Queue panel, or Effect Controls panel
Previews.keyTrans: 将选择范围扩展到“项目”面板、“渲染队列”面板或“效果控件”面板中的上一个项目

Views.keyName: Duplicate selected layers, masks, effects, text selectors, animators, puppet meshes, shapes, render items, output modules, or compositions
Views.keyTrans: 复制选定的图层、蒙版、效果、文本选择器、动画师、木偶网格、形状、渲染项目、输出模块或合成

Modifying layer properties.keyName: Display filename corresponding to the frame at the current time in the Info panel
Modifying layer properties.keyTrans: 在“信息”面板中显示与当前时间帧对应的文件名

Markers.keyName: Cycle through color bit depths for project
Markers.keyTrans: 循环浏览项目的颜色位深度
Markers.keyValue: Alt-click bit-depth button at bottom of Project panel

Motion Tracking.keyValue: Click bit-depth button at bottom of Project panel

undefined.keyName: Add a composition to the Adobe Media Encoder encoding queue
undefined.keyTrans: 将合成添加到 Adobe Media Encoder 编码队列

toolTrans: 在时间轴面板中显示属性和组
在效果控件面板中显示属性
